info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Davie County through 715 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Mocksville, or 5 miles south of Bermuda Run, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mocksville, Bermuda Run, Cooleemee, Fork Church, Advance and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
